# PKIdentityIntentToStore

**Class**

An object that represents your intention to store an identity element or values derived from an identity element.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKIdentityIntentToStore
```

## Creating a default intent

- **mayStore(days:)**: An object that indicates your app may store a data element for the length of time you specify.

## Getting default intents

- **mayStore**: An object that indicates your app may store a data element for an indefinite length of time.
- **willNotStore**: An object that indicates your app won’t store a data element any longer than necessary to complete a request.

## Describing a document

- **PKIdentityDriversLicenseDescriptor**: An object for requesting information from a user’s driver’s license or equivalent document.
- **PKIdentityDocumentDescriptor**: A type that describes the structure and behavior of an identity document.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
